questions.text: How would you rate the overall effectiveness of the professor's teaching methods?
How would you rate your satisfaction with the course materials provided?
How clear and concise was the professor's communication (e.g., instructions, explanations)?
What aspects of the course did you find most helpful?
What aspects of the course could be improved?
How would you rate the professor's responsiveness and availability to students?
What type of assessment methods were most effective for you in this course?
